entry.title: Friday: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
